classmeta.shortdesc: A GdkCursor is represents a predefined or self-created mouse pointer.

desc.simpara: A GdkCursor is represents an X11 mouse pointer. There are several predefined cursors (see GdkCursorType), but you can create your own monochrome (2-color, not just black/white) pointers as well.

prop.shortdesc: The number of the current GdkCursorType.

desc.simpara: The number of the current GdkCursorType.

prop.shortdesc: The name of the current cursor type.

desc.simpara: The name of the current cursor type. The names are the same as the GdkCursorType constants, except that they are lowercase, omit the beginning GDK_ and have hyphens instead of underscores. For example, GDK_IRON_CROSS has the name iron-cross.
